description: Reserved matters relating to Development Zone W for: - A shared part lower ground part basement area across Development Zone W. - Plot W1 for the erection of a 12 to 17 storey building to provide 140 residential units (Use Class C3) and commerical space to ground floor (Use Class A1-A5). - Plot W2 for the erection of an 8 storey building to provide 78 residential units (Use Class C3)(including 36 social rented and 23 intermediate) and commerical space to ground floor (Use Class A1-A5). - Basement area to include 363 cycle spaces, 48 car parking spaces, plant, refuse and ancillary uses. As required by conditions 6, 9, 10, 12, 14, 16-23, 27-28, 31, 33-38, 45-46, 48-49, 50A, 51, 56, 60, 64-67 of outline planning permission granted 22/12/2006 subject to a S106 agreement (2004/2307/P) for a comprehensive, phased, mixed-use development of former railway lands within the Kings Cross Opportunity Area.
